welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brackley, where history and charm come together to create a unique experience. Explore our quaint town and discover its rich heritage and charming local shops. We hope you enjoy your stay and create lasting memories in our beautiful city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northampton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxford (Kidlington) Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a range of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport is used exclusively by the Royal Air Force.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Benson Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
